full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

Notice is hereby given that the Contracting Authority, Environment and Climate Change Canada, is seeking proposals for the provision of services and preventative maintenance related to the loading of the Vaisala ARLS AS41 at Fort Smith, NT.

#### Solicitation Information

*   Solicitation Number: 5000075642
*   Publication Date: 2024-06-21
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-23T14:00:00
*   Amendment Date: 2024-07-23

#### Contract Details

*   Contracting Entity: Environment and Climate Change Canada
*   Contact Information:
    *   Name: Megan Filliol
    *   Email: <megan.filliol@ec.gc.ca>
    *   Phone: (819) 307-2084
    *   Address: 351, boul. Saint-Joseph, Gatineau, QC K1A0H3, Canada
*   End User Entities: None

#### Background

Environment and Climate Change Canada requires a Contractor to provide services and preventative maintenance related to the loading of the Vaisala ARLS AS41 at Fort Smith, NT, as detailed in the Statement of Work, Annex “A” to the bid solicitation.

#### Key Requirements

*   The period of the contract is from 01 September 2024 to 31 August 2026, with the option to extend the term of the Contract by up to three (3) additional one (1) year period(s).
*   The selection criteria is the highest combined rating of Technical Merit (60%) and Price (40%).
*   There are security requirements associated with this requirement. For additional information, consult Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses.
*   Trade Agreements: The requirement is subject to the provisions of various free trade agreements.

#### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be downloaded from the following links:

*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40861/5000075642_fort-smith-arls_rfp_en_final.pdf (English)
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40861/5000075642_fort-smith-arls_rfp_fr_final.pdf (French)
